title: How to Transfer Photos from Your Camera to Picasa 3 and Send by Gmail

steps.headline: Put the camera SD-Card in the slot of your laptop.
Click My Computer and select folder Removable disc.
Double-click this folder to show files and select a file with photos you want to send.
Click Option->Enlarge photos to Medium size.
Click the first photo to be sent, then press (Shift and +) then click over the last photo you want to send.
steps.description: Now "selected photos" appear in a blue shade.

methods.name: Create new folder and paste selected photos

steps.headline: Go to Desktop.
steps.description: Right click at any blank place. Select New folder.

steps.headline: Click Rename and type a name for new folder.
Double-Click to open this new folder.
Right click over opened folder.
steps.description: Click Paste. Wait till all the photos are pasted.

steps.headline: Go to Desktop.
steps.description: Select desktop window Picasa-3 & double click.

steps.headline: Click newly created folder of photos.
Click size to uploads and select Small size.

methods.name: Posting\/sending the photos by your Gmail

steps.headline: Click Photo bar.
steps.description: Click the newly named folder of photos to be sent.

steps.headline: Click Share.
steps.description: Select email address and  fill details on subject of photos you are sending.

steps.headline: Click Send.
steps.description: Eject the Camera SD Card from Laptop

text: Selecting photos from Camera SD-Card Put the camera SD-Card in the slot of your laptop.  Click My Computer and select folder Removable disc.  Double-click this folder to show files and select a file with photos you want to send.  Click Option->Enlarge photos to Medium size.  Click the first photo to be sent, then press (Shift and +) then click over the last photo you want to send. Now "selected photos" appear in a blue shade. Right-Click on any photo,select Copy. Minimize the entire window. Create new folder and paste selected photos Go to Desktop. Right click at any blank place. Select New folder. Click Rename and type a name for new folder.  Double-Click to open this new folder.  Right click over opened folder. Click Paste. Wait till all the photos are pasted. Upload the photos over Picasa-3 Go to Desktop. Select desktop window Picasa-3 & double click. Click newly created folder of photos. Upload(click Green arrow at bottom) Click size to uploads and select Small size.  Click upload. Uploading photos take few minutes. Posting\/sending the photos by your Gmail Open your Gmail account.  Click Photo bar. Click the newly named folder of photos to be sent. Click Share. Select email address and  fill details on subject of photos you are sending. Click Send. Eject the Camera SD Card from Laptop
